Description: Incense burner or stand made of pottery; red burnished ware with applied zig-zag decoration in white; top inside surface with applied white spot decoration.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2003 10 Apr-31 Aug, Barcelona, CaixaForum, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan 2003/4 23 Sep-4 Jan, Madrid, Sala de Exposiciones de la Fundacio, Nubia: Los reinos del Nilo en Sudan
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
